articles.title: Credentials of Sri Lankan Ambassador Accepted
DPRK FM Meets New Sri Lankan Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Sri Lankan Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, had a talk with Karunatilaka Amunugama, Sri Lankan ambassador newly accredited to the DPRK, on Wednesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Luxembourgian Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Luxembourgian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Christian Social People's Party of Luxembourg led by Frank Engel, member of the Standing Committee of the party, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
